::DrillBit::

He was occupied with KitKat's safety, and was hit by some of Jet Storm's
shots. He was able to avoid the rest. He had been hit in the back, but
only the organic parts were hit. He turned to Jet Storm.
"Big mistake! Now you burn, in the pit!"
He fired his two optics, and his gattaling gun, at Jet Storm.

He saw Megatron, and other troops arrive.
"Yes! Reinforcements are here!"

::Hot Rod::

He had to think this over. He wanted them to be together again, more
than anything, but it might be hard for her. He came to a decision.
"I think it would be foolish to start again," he stated.
"I say we pick up where we left off. We'll recover your memories,
together."
He thought about how corny that sounded.

He decided to move on to her question about the battle.
"After we came here, the base was attacked by the Mafia. We easily
defended the base. Soon, they started to retreat. We followed, and the
fight ended up at their base. I was injured, and returned to base, to
repair. When I returned,  I found..." 
He cut off. It was hard to say this.
"I found what was left of your body, after you self destructed," he
finally got out.
